    Documentation for script1.py¶

    class Class_exercise_routine.Exercise(exercise_name, muscle_group, difficulty_level, repetitions, sets)[source]¶

    Class representing an individual exercise, containing basic information about the exercise type, difficulty, and other details.

    Contains the following attributes: - exercise_name: Exercise name - muscle_group: Muscle group targeted by the exercise - difficulty_level: Difficulty level of the exercise (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced) - repetitions: Number of repetitions per set - sets: Number of sets of the exercise

    Contains the following methods: - show_information: Displays the information about the exercise - is_suitable_for: Evaluates if the exercise is suitable for a user with a given difficulty level - increase_intensity: Increases the number of repetitions and/or sets of the exercise

    increase_intensity(repetitions_increase, sets_increase)[source]¶

    Method to increase the number of repetitions and/or sets of the exercise.

    Parameters:

    • repetitions_increase (int) – The number of repetitions to add to the initial value.

    • sets_increase (int) – The number of sets to add to the initial value.

    is_suitable_for(user_level)[source]¶

    Method to evaluate if the exercise is suitable for a user with a given difficulty level.

    Parameters:

    user_level (str) – User’s knowledge level (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)

    Returns:

    Returns true if the user can perform the exercise given their level, false otherwise.

    Return type:

    Boolean

    show_information()[source]¶

    Method that displays the information about the exercise.

    class Class_exercise_routine.Routine(routine_name, muscle_group, difficulty_level, repetitions, sets, goal, routine_level)[source]¶

    Represents a workout routine composed of multiple exercises targeting a muscle group with a specific objective and difficulty level.

    add_exercise(exercise)[source]¶

    Adds an exercise to the routine.

    Parameters:

    exercise (Exercise) – The exercise to add to the routine.

    remove_exercise(name)[source]¶

    Removes an exercise from the routine by name.

    Parameters:

    name (str) – The name of the exercise to remove.

    If the exercise is not found, displays an informative message.

    show_routine()[source]¶

    Displays the complete routine, including its goal, difficulty level, and a list of exercises.
